column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat Diner transcends omelets and French toast
column2: serving an all-day breakfast menu strewn with ethnic-inspired dishes. From Crumpets with Chorizo Maple Syrup to Kimchee & Bacon & Eggs & Pancakes to a South Asian Parathas Burrito
column3: the menu is just familiar enough but with flavorful twists to keep dishes interesting.
